textAfterTable: 10/09/2013 John Kellermann featured two songs by Victor Jara (assassinated 40 years ago by the Pinochet Junta installed by a CIA-backed coup), three songs by Michael Smith, three songs that mention the Garden of Eden, three songs for Halloween (the first by Michael Smith, followed by two very different versions of the same Child ballad), ending with three folk songs by Joe Hickerson and one by Sara Grey, who will be performing October 18 at the Portland Folk Music Society 3rd Friday concert at St. David of Wales Church.
